summary: Change your sprint animation to ninjas sprint.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first animation mod, I change sprint animation to be like ninja sprint.
It's only sprint now, but if it have a good reaction I will make another cool animation.

[img] http://www.static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/51057-1-1392358686.jpg [/img]

Main Files :
Type-1 is like Anime sprint
Type-2 almost same but wider arms (weapon wield include).

Optional Files :
Type-2b same as type 2 with lower camera.


Instal :
Use NMM or you can manual instal it, just extract it on your data folder.

uninstal :
Use NMM or you can manual uninstal by delete the mt_sprintforward.hkx
in data > meshes > actor > character > male and female folder.

Thank you for XP32 and Bergzore, they teach me how to animating.

Do not upload it anywhere else without my permission.

My other mod
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50061] Double Swords [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29959] Gunblade leonhart [/url]
[url=Http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30580/] cloud Strife Armor [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30706] Squall outfit [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27521] Sasuke Sword Style [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28348] Rogue Race based on Sasuke sword style [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28779] Itachi and Kisame from Akatsuki [/url]

okay, thats it I think.
Terima Kasih.


[color=red] ~Leonhart benk~ [/color]
author: Benk
